question: Which state government has launched Walk to Work on Wednesdays (WWW) campaign?
explanation: Meghalaya Chief Minister Conrad K Sangma has launched  Walk to Work on Wednesdays (WWW) campaign in the state. The campaign is a part of the nationwide Fit India Movement, which has been launched in the country by the Prime Minister. The idea of \'walk to work\' will have multiple benefits like cost cutting of fuel including reduction of CO2 emission, reduction in congestion in the city and the most important “health and fitness” for the citizens.
